item.title: This is really going to disrupt everything
item.description:
Our Event application can use iBeacons:
https://evapp.nextapps.pl

“iBeacon. This is really going to disrupt everything” - Tim O'Reilly. 


Yes. It is true.  If you want to find another way to sell products, stay in touch with your customer and create a business model based on interactions, engagement, loyalty -you should use beacon in your business. Why to break your business model if you could simply build a mobile app for business?

The answer is: because you should mix new technologies and trends with your domain:
  • allow customers to rediscover your products and services;
  • locate a set of beacons in shops, commercial centers, events, sports facilities and branches;
  • send offers and discounts to customers when near a product
  • offer coupons to customers after a purchase to share with their friends, thus encouraging others to visit during a sale or during a special event;
  • shoppers can tag a product for a friend who could not find it or was looking for it;
  • combine social with beacons and use promotions, contests and challenges to get your loyal customers, to bring in new people or even make it easier for them to promote the store, i.e. they get a higher discount if they invite and bring new customers;
  • better networking at conferences and events using beacons for location and info;
  • assistance for disabled or blind people. Use beacons and voice activated directions or alerts to help someone that is visually impaired.

item.title: BattleHack Berlin
item.description:
https://2015.battlehack.org/

We make Simplicity app using BrainTree API for easy voice payments. It was our idea to develope app for people with problem using standard smartphone interface.


We prepared our app for people:
  • visually impaired
  • car drivers or in other situation when you can speak but not touch ;)


IoT, Wearables and voice inteface is quite interesting area for apps because it can give us more users than sticking to smart phones. It's also important that we believe that social responsibility could be key factor for corporates to use voice interface in new digital world apps.

item.title: Event Mobile App
item.description:
polyconf.com
Android Play
Evapp application for events and conferences. You can build and customize the application to an event. Attendees can check the schedule, the speakers’ bio, partners and sponsors in a simple way. The application can work in two modes with and without registration. You can send push notifications and use QR scanner for tickets.
You can promote your conference and cut the cost of mobile applications which are available on then main mobile platforms such as Android, iOS and WP8. Tell us your requirements and we will develop awesome apps for your business.

item.title: Hybrid Apps
item.description:
centrum24.pl
m.bzwbk24.pl
For 11 years we were (and whole team of course) responsible for development of electronic banking apps. A lot of Java and C/C++ code, we changed app from EJB/JSP to Apache Wicket Framework and later to AngularJS. We were in mobile banking apps projects, tring to reuse our code base with other software house. We were pionieers of hybrid apps (Ionic framework) for better CX and faster/better software delivery.
We created REST API for electronic banking apps and backends services
In corporate enviroment it was always challenging
one small step for [a] bank, one giant leap for developers.
